Title: Hilter
Writer: Sam Catlin (developed by), Seth Rogen (developed by), Evan Goldberg (developed by), Garth Ennis (based on the graphic novels by), Steve Dillon (based on the graphic novels by), Carla Ching
Actors: Dominic Cooper, Joseph Gilgun, Ruth Negga, Graham McTavish
Plot: In order to advert the apocalypse, Jesse, Tulip, Gran'ma and Starr must work together. Cassidy learns to love Eccaarius but it comes at a price.
